snippet.title: BANJO KAZOOIE-THE BEAR WAKER (LAUNCH TRAILER)
snippet.description:
#nintendo64 #legendofzelda #windwaker

THE LEGEND OF BANJO KAZOOIE - THE BEAR WAKER

STORY:
-King of Red Lions is waiting for Link to go in search of her sister and defeat the evil Ganondorf, but it seems he is delaying and for some strange reason the door of his house is locked. So Banjo and Kazooie should like to explore Outset Island in search of clues to be able to find a way to open the door of his house and find out what could have happened... 

SUPPORT my Youtube channel: https://www.patreon.com/Kurko or https://www.paypal.me/KurkoMods
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kurko_mods
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Markus_Kurko 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Kurko_mods/

DOWNLOAD: just drop your "Banjo-Kazooie (U) [!]" rom here https://patch.wedarobi.com/bk_bear_waker

 BUGS:
- The game resets the note counter from Stats Screen when you lose a life or restarts the game. This doesn't affect the gameplay.
- In the countless times I've tested the game it has crashed 3 times (all in Outset Island area). I have tried to optimize it everything I could after these 3 times, but is possible that it would happen again.
- If you touch a Yum Yum (the clams) while you are using the Mumbo Transformation, he will take away all your feathers. And if you have many of them, it's possible that the game crashes.
(This bug only happens when a dialogue is open)

 ------KURKO MODS PROJECTS-------
-THE LEGEND OF BANJO KAZOOIE: GRUNTILDA'S MASK (2019)
https://youtu.be/Z7dQWmg7kGs
-BANJO KAZOOIE in HYRULE TEMPLE (From Smash Bros series) Playable Mod (2019)
https://youtu.be/sVOSwG6XU9U
-THE LEGEND OF BANJO KAZOOIE - THE BEAR WAKER (2019)
https://youtu.be/PyA00Lpix20
-BANJO KAZOOIE x DONKEY KONG COUNTRY (2019)
https://youtu.be/5v2IbWkuMGg
-JIGGIES OF TIME - "EAGLE DUNGEON" (2019):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-C8zYMVjct4&t
-JIGGIES OF TIME - KAKARIKO (2017 demo):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rsLAThcwD5c&t=
-JIGGIES OF TIME - KOKIRI FOREST (2015 demo):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HTbN0hZf_qk&t
BOB-OMB NEW FIELD (2014 one level based in Super Mario 64):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5M6-i1S79OI
-A VIDEOTUTORIAL EXPLAINING HOW TO MAKE THEM WORKS!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2MZ00NXw07I
